description: A tube inserted into the trachea through a surgical incision in the neck, used to provide an airway for patients who cannot breathe on their own.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Presence or absence of a tracheostomy tube in the patient.

values.name: present
values.description: A tracheostomy tube is present in the patient.

values.name: absent
values.description: A tracheostomy tube is not present in the patient.

attributes.name: tube_tip
attributes.description: The location of the tip of the tracheostomy tube within the trachea.

values.name: upper thoracic trachea
values.description: The tip of the tracheostomy tube is located in the upper thoracic trachea.

values.name: midthoracic trachea
values.description: The tip of the tracheostomy tube is located in the midthoracic trachea.

attributes.name: tract
attributes.description: The presence of soft tissue thickening around the tracheostomy tube insertion site.

values.name: soft tissue thickening
values.description: There is soft tissue thickening around the tracheostomy tube insertion site.

values.name: no soft tissue thickening
values.description: There is no soft tissue thickening around the tracheostomy tube insertion site.

attributes.name: associated_findings
attributes.description: Any associated findings related to the tracheostomy tube.

values.name: aspiration
values.description: Aspiration related to the tracheostomy tube.

values.name: tracheal mucus
values.description: Presence of mucus in the trachea related to the tracheostomy tube.

values.name: bronchial mucus
values.description: Presence of mucus in the bronchial tubes related to the tracheostomy tube.

values.name: bronchial mucus plugs
values.description: Presence of mucus plugs in the bronchial tubes related to the tracheostomy tube.
